for _ in range(int(input())):
 n = int(input())
 ls = []
 rs = []
 lrs = []

 for i in range(n):
  l, r = map(int, input().split())
  ls.append(l)
  rs.append(r)
  lrs.append((l, r, i))

 lrs.sort()

 c = 0
 maxi = -1

 res = [-1] * n
 for l, r, i in lrs:
  if ls[i] > maxi:
   maxi = rs[i]
   res[i] = c

  elif rs[i] <= maxi:
   res[i] = 1^c

  else:
   maxi = rs[i]
   c ^= 1
   res[i] = c

 print(*res, sep='')

 n = int(input())
 ls = []
 rs = []
 lrs = []

 for i in range(n):
  l, r = map(int, input().split())
  ls.append(l)
  rs.append(r)
  lrs.append((l, r, i))

 lrs.sort()

 c = 0
 maxi = -1

 print(*res, sep='')

# cook your dish here
def f (arr: list):
 arr.sort()
 # print(arr)
 pl, pr, pc = float('-inf'), float('-inf'), 0
 col = [0 for x in range(len(arr))]
 for i in arr:
  nl, nr = i[0], i[1]
  if nl > pr:
   i.append(0)
   pl, pr, pc = nl, nr, 0
  else:
   nc = 0 if pc == 1 else 1
   i.append(nc)
   pc = nc if nr > pr else pc
   pr = max(pr, nr)
  col[i[2]] = str(i[3])
 return "".join(col)

T = int(input())
for t in range(T):
 n = int(input())
 arr = []
 for i in range(n):
  l, r = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
  arr.append([l,r,i])
 print(f(arr))

def f (arr: list):
 arr.sort()
 # print(arr)
 pl, pr, pc = float('-inf'), float('-inf'), 0
 col = [0 for x in range(len(arr))]
 for i in arr:
  nl, nr = i[0], i[1]
  if nl > pr:
   i.append(0)
   pl, pr, pc = nl, nr, 0
  else:
   nc = 0 if pc == 1 else 1
   i.append(nc)
   pc = nc if nr > pr else pc
   pr = max(pr, nr)
  col[i[2]] = str(i[3])
 return "".join(col)

T = int(input())
for t in range(T):
 n = int(input())
 arr = []
 for i in range(n):
  l, r = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
  arr.append([l,r,i])
 print(f(arr))
